rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Strategize. Activate only if you attacked with a Human this turn. [i](Put the top card of your tactic deck into your hand.)[/i]
notes:
Gas mask? Chain of Command? Tea? Pazzeralli’s Tours? Artificer’s Guild? Studded Heel? The Gray Hand?

Needs to be: colourless land or artifact. Good in aggressive decks. Costs 3 or less.

Resume!

unprinted
